TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in Lübbenau .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( HBG HolzBerufsgenossenschaft ) refused to recognise the applicant ’s respiratory diseases as an occupational disease ( GPE ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant , represented by lawyer , filed an objection against the aforementioned decision . The objection was rejected on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought an action in ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the respondent party submitted the statement of defence and the applicant ’s files .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG requested inter alia reports of CARDINAL doctors the applicant had consulted prior to the proceedings as well as medical documentation regarding the applicant ’s CARDINAL prior stays in hospital . DATE these documents had been obtained in their entirety and ORG submitted the documents to the parties .

CARDINAL . On DATE and on DATE ORG asked the applicant to concretise the claim . On DATE the applicant submitted that the aim of the action was to determine that he was suffering from an occupational disease .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG decided to obtain a first expert opinion concerning CARDINAL specific questions and named an expert ( Mr GPE ) . The applicant cancelled the first examination fixed for DATE due to illness . On DATE the expert examined the applicant . On CARDINAL DATE the expert submitted his report of CARDINAL pages , in which he found inter alia that a further expert opinion was necessary .

CARDINAL . NORP On DATE ORG decided to obtain another expert opinion on different aspects of the CARDINAL questions and named an expert ( Ms P.H. ) . The expert indicated her willingness to render the expert opinion .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant changed lawyer .

CARDINAL . On DATE the expert PERSON informed ORG that the applicant should first be examined by another expert ( Ms U.R. ) . On DATE the applicant challenged the latter expert on grounds of bias . By letter of DATE ORG rejected this challenge and informed the applicant that it considered the examination necessary . On DATE the applicant informed ORG that he was willing to cooperate .

CARDINAL . On DATE the expert ORG submitted her report of CARDINAL pages . On DATE ORG submitted the files to the expert PERSON in order for her to render the requested expert opinion . On DATE PERSON informed ORG that she was unable to give the expert opinion .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG amended its decision of DATE and named another expert ( Mr D.A. ) . On DATE Mr D.A. informed ORG that he was unable to give the expert opinion in a timely manner .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG again amended its decision of DATE and named another expert ( PERSON . ) . On DATE ORG was informed that PERSON . had retired .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG again amended its decision of DATE and named another expert ( Mr GPE ) . On DATE Mr GPE informed ORG that he was unable to give the expert opinion in a timely manner .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG again amended its decision of DATE and named another expert ( PERSON ) . On DATE the latter informed ORG that he was unable to give the expert opinion .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG made a new decision to obtain an expert opinion and named an expert ( PERSON ) . On DATE ORG was informed that PERSON had retired .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG amended its decision of CARDINAL DATE and named another expert ( Mr PERSON ) . On DATE Mr PERSON informed ORG that he was unable to give the expert opinion .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant changed lawyer . In DATE the new lawyer withdrew from the case . In DATE one of the applicant ’s previous lawyers reappointed herself .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG again amended its decision of CARDINAL DATE and named another expert ( Mr GPE ) . On DATE ORG was informed that the expert had retired .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG anew amended its decision of CARDINAL DATE and named another expert ( Mr GPE ) . On DATE the expert submitted his report of CARDINAL pages . On DATE the expert supplemented his report .
CARDINAL . On DATE the report was submitted to the parties in order to obtain their comments .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG scheduled a hearing for DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG held an oral hearing and rejected the applicant ’s claim . The written judgment was served on the applicant ’s lawyer on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant appealed against the judgment .
